Name: Deploy Older SSIS project from a package
Description: Deploys SSIS projects to SQL Server Integration Services - based on the previous method employeed in Arion

Parameters.Name: SSIS_NugetPackageName
Parameters.Label: Package to deploy
Parameters.HelpText: The ID of the NuGet package you want to deploy.

Parameters.Name: SSIS_ServerName
Parameters.Label: SQL Integration Service Server name (\instance)
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the SSIS Server you are deploying to.

Parameters.Name: SSIS_ParentFolder
Parameters.Label: Parent Folder
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the parent folder to create in Integration Services Catalogs on SSIS Server.

Parameters.Name: SSIS_FolderName
Parameters.Label: Folder name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the folder to use within the Integration Services Catalog

Parameters.Name: SSIS_ProjectName
Parameters.Label: Project name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the project within the folder of the Integration Services catalog
